prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Helen Adams Keller Collection, Accession #7819, Clifton Waller Barrett Library, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was made a gift to the Library by Clifton Waller Barrett.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: In a letter, February 19, 1925, to Mr. Jones, Keller writes requesting funds on behalf of the Helen Keller Endowment Fund for the American Foundation for the Blind and referring to a recent meeting at St. Paul's Church on behalf of the blind persons in the United States.
